meanings.definition: A magnetic tape used for recording sound.
meanings.sent1: I found an old audiotape in the attic.
meanings.sent2: The audiotape contained recordings of my grandparents' voices.
meanings.sent3: The audiotape tried to play music, but it got tangled in the player!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like an audiotape, preserving moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The audiotape snapped, silencing the music forever.

meanings.sent1: I will audiotape the interview for future reference.
meanings.sent2: She audiotaped her singing to listen and improve.
meanings.sent3: He audiotaped his jokes to share with friends.
meanings.sent4: The laughter was audiotaped, capturing the joy of the moment.
meanings.sent5: Audiotaping the lecture helped me study for the exam.
